name: Chasm Not Fixed
description:
We were 2 guys to make this project, Haragrim (Art, Game design) and me Nodeions (Programmer, Game Design) ! Musics are a free copyright musics !

It's about a traveler who walk into chasm, it's clearly inspired by Made In Abyss. Making a good prototype is hard for 3 days but we tried it ! So that's why we name it "Chasm Not Fixed"
